articles.title: Steel Industry can provide long-term sustainable solution for plastic waste management: Steel Minister
articles.description: The Ministry of Steel organised a meeting to deliberate the findings of the report ‘Plastic Waste utilization in Iron and Steel Industry’ by the Steel Research and Technology Mission of India (SRTMI).
articles.content:
NEW DELHI :
Increased use of plastic waste in Iron and Steel industry can provide a long-term sustainable solution, said Union Steel Minister, Ram Chandra Prasad Singh on Friday.
